mapper.update: UPDATE PAY0252T SET BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID = #{fTrnscId}, BANK_STATE_MAPPING_STUS_ID = 4, BANK_STATE_MAPPING_USER_ID = #{userId}, BANK_STATE_MAPPING_DT = SYSDATE, BANK_CHG_MAPPING_ID = #{fTrnscId}, BANK_CHG_MAPPING_STUS_ID = 4, BANK_CHG_MAPPING_USER_ID = #{userId}, BANK_CHG_MAPPING_DT = SYSDATE WHERE GROUP_SEQ = #{groupSeq}

UPDATE PAY0081D SET OTH_KEYIN_STUS_ID = 4, OTH_KEYIN_MAPPING_DT = SYSDATE, OTH_KEYIN_MAPPING_USER_ID = #{userId}, OTH_KEYIN_BC_STUS_ID = 4, OTH_KEYIN_BC_MAPPING_DT = SYSDATE, OTH_KEYIN_BC_MAPPING_USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE F_TRNSC_ID = #{fTrnscId}
mapper.select: SELECT PAY_ITM_REF_DT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY OR_NO) AS BANK_SEQ, GROUP_SEQ, SALES_ORD_NO, OR_NO, BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID, ADV_AMT, CUST_ID, ACC_CODE, (SELECT CODE FROM SYS0013M CD WHERE CD.CODE_ID = #{accCode}) AS DIFF_TYPE FROM ( SELECT C.PAY_ITM_REF_DT, A.GROUP_SEQ, D.SALES_ORD_NO, B.OR_NO, A.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID, D.CUST_ID, E.ACC_CODE, SUM(C.PAY_ITM_AMT) AS ADV_AMT FROM PAY0252T A JOIN PAY0064D B ON A.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID JOIN PAY0065D C ON A.PAY_ITM_ID = C.PAY_ITM_ID JOIN SAL0001D D ON B.SALES_ORD_ID = D.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.F_TRNSC_ID, C.ACC_CODE FROM PAY0079D A JOIN PAY0081D B ON A.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = B.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M C ON A.BANK_ID = C.ACC_ID ) E ON A.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID = E.F_TRNSC_ID WHERE A.GROUP_SEQ = #{groupSeq} GROUP BY C.PAY_ITM_REF_DT, A.GROUP_SEQ, D.SALES_ORD_NO, B.OR_NO, A.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID, D.CUST_ID, E.ACC_CODE )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ITF0942M ( IF_KEY, SEQ, IF_TYPE, TRAN_STATUS_CD, RGST_DT, RGST_TM, RGST_ID, PAY_DT, BANK_SEQ, GRP_SEQ, ORD_NO, WOR_NO, BANK_ID, BANKAC, ADV_AMT, DIFF_TYPE, DIFF_AMT ) VALUES ( FN_CRT_IFKEY('942'), 1, '942', '10', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HHMMSS'), #{userId}, #{payItmRefDt}, #{bankSeq}, #{groupSeq}, #{salesOrdNo}, #{orNo}, #{bankStateMappingId}, #{accCode}, #{advAmt}, #{diffType}, NVL(#{variance},0) )

INSERT INTO ITF0942M ( IF_KEY, SEQ, IF_TYPE, TRAN_STATUS_CD, RGST_DT, RGST_TM, RGST_ID, PAY_DT, BANK_SEQ, GRP_SEQ, ORD_NO, WOR_NO, CUST_NO, DEBT_AMT ) VALUES ( FN_CRT_IFKEY('942'), 1, '942', '10', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HHMMSS'), #{userId}, #{payItmRefDt}, #{bankSeq}, #{groupSeq}, #{salesOrdNo}, #{orNo}, #{custId}, #{advAmt} )
